title: Dear Riot. A plea for Evelynn.
body:
I wish you'd make her viable as a mid laner again. I remember playing her before her nerf. It was the most fun I had ever had in LoL before. Even now, there's no champion that could compare to the fun I had with her. But now, she's not the champion I loved. She's not even Evelynn anymore. 

Now, she's relegated to the jungle as a AD tank. Like, are you kidding me??? She's a mage. Not an tanky AD. She shouldn't have to be built as an AD bruiser to be viable! Please riot. Do something with her, but make her fun again. I want to play her mid lane once more. 

P.S. Get rid of that stupid effing ult. It's no good.
